pageDescription: Select the Appearance & Functionality Mods to apply to your SchoolMaker School and enhance your Clients' User Experience!
gettingStarted: Select your first mod to get started!
step1: Enable and configure the mods you want to use from the list below.
step2: Click the floating "Copy Code" button in the bottom right corner to copy the generated script to your clipboard.
step3: In your SchoolMaker admin dashboard, navigate to Settings > Custom Code.
step4: Paste the copied code into the text area labeled <head> Custom Code and save your changes. The mods will be active on your live school site.
whyContent: The SchoolMaker team needs to focus on features that make sense for a majority of customers. SchoolMaker Mods allows you to add features or customize the look of your school to your specific needs, without writing code. This tool simplifies the process of enabling, disabling, and configuring different features without having to manually edit code.
generatedCodeDescription: This is the generated code for all enabled mods, ready to be copied.
copiedToClipboardDescription: You can now paste the code into your school.
copyFailedDescription: Could not copy code to clipboard.
configureDescription: Adjust the settings for this mod. Click save when you're done.
previewDescription: A preview of what this mod does. Close the modal when you're done.
footerDisclaimer: This is an independent project and is not affiliated with SchoolMaker.
fieldIsNumber: This field must be a number.
modCantBeEnabledDescription: This mod cannot be enabled until all required options are configured.
levelMustBePositive: Level must be a positive number.
levelMustBeUnique: Each level number must be unique.
mod_transform-school-name_description: Removes the default uppercase styling from the school name in the navigation bar.
mod_programs-singular_description: Changes the plural 'Programmes' title to singular 'Programme' in the navigation.
mod_update-program-link_description: Updates the main 'Programs' navigation link to point to a specific program ID.
mod_ask-question-new-tab_description: Makes the 'Ask a question' button under lessons open in a new tab.
mod_sticky-sections_description: Makes the section headers in a program sticky to the top of the page when scrolling.
mod_course-card-customizer_description: Customize the appearance of the course cards on the programs page.
mod_course-card-customizer_config_cardTi: Only letters, numbers, spaces, hyphens, and exclamation marks are allowed.
mod_chapter-style-customizer_description: Customizes the appearance of a program's section groups (chapters) for better visual consistency.
mod_section-arrow-reorder_description: Moves the expand/collapse arrow for sections to the right side, for a cleaner layout.
mod_sidebar-toggle-customizer_descriptio: Replaces the default sidebar toggle icons with Google Material Icons and allows color customization.
mod_global-font-customizer_description: Changes the default font for your entire school by importing a Google Font.
mod_community-level-badge_description: Displays a custom badge next to a community member's name based on their level.
mod_community-level-badge_config_descrip: For each level, specify a title, an icon, and a color. The icon should be a valid Font Awesome V5 icon name (e.g., 'award', 'star', 'user-graduate').
mod_horizontal-payment-plans_description: Changes the payment plan selection to a horizontal pricing table and makes the "Next" button full width.
